Title: Changes the official name of the Staten Island Expressway to the POW-MIA Memorial Highway
Summary: Changes the official name of the Staten Island Expressway to the "POW-MIA Memorial Highway".
LawCode: Amd §121, State L; amd §§340-a, 343-a & 349-f, Hway L; amd §§3-202 & 11-243, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state law, the highway law and the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to renaming the Staten Island Expressway the "POW-MIA Memorial Highway"
